title: Push Notifications - Verify push notifications on apple watch when game starts
custom_preconds:
User has installed MLB App on apple watch as companion app 
User has opted for Notifications during Onboarding 
User has the apple watch on wrist and iPhone is locked
custom_steps: GIVEN there are live games schedule for current day
custom_expected: THEN user should receive push notification on apple watch when the game starts

title: Push Notifications - Verify push notifications on apple watch when score changes
custom_preconds:
User has installed MLB App on apple watch as companion app
User has opted for Notifications during Onboarding
User has the apple watch on wrist and iPhone is locked
custom_steps: GIVEN there are live games schedule for current day
custom_expected: THEN user should receive push notification on apple watch when the score changes

title: Push Notifications - Verify the push notifications for team news
custom_preconds:
User has installed MLB App on apple watch as companion app
User has opted for Notifications during Onboarding
User has the apple watch on wrist and iPhone is locked
custom_steps: GIVEN there are live games schedule for current day
custom_expected: THEN user should receive push notification on apple watch regarding any team news

title: Push notifications - Verify the push notifications for News Articles
custom_preconds:
User has installed MLB App on apple watch as companion app
User has opted for Notifications during Onboarding
User has the apple watch on wrist and iPhone is locked
custom_steps: GIVEN there are live games schedule for current day
custom_expected: THEN user should receive push notification on apple watch related to any news articles

title: Push notifications - Verify the push notifications for video on demand
custom_preconds:
User has installed MLB App on apple watch as companion app
User has opted for Notifications during Onboarding
User has the apple watch on wrist and iPhone is locked
custom_steps: GIVEN there are live games schedule for current day
custom_expected: THEN user should receive push notification on apple watch for video on demand

title: Teams page - user has a favorite team and NO followed teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch
AND user has a favorite team selected
AND user doesn't have followed teams

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the MLB app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with first slide

* Time on the top right corner
* Team logo
* Team color background  (around 70% of the screen)
* Team name 
* Division
* Wins losses, games behind
* Game mini states/scores (separate TC)
* Page indicator with first circle highlighted

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user taps on the screen
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN screen is not tappable

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls up and down
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN screen is not scrollable

title: Teams page - user has a favorite team and followed teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch
AND user has a favorite team selected
AND user has followed teams selected

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the MLB app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with first slide
AND user's favorite team is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls down
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees followed team info in the same format as favorite team

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls down more
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN next followed team is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has all teams selected as followed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all teams are displayed in the list

title: Teams page - user has NO favorite team and NO followed teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch
AND user does NOT have a favorite team selected
AND user does NOT have followed teams selected

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the MLB app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with first slide

* Time on the top right corner
* 'No Team' title
* copy 'Add your favorite and followed teams in the MLB App'

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user clicks on 'Open MLB App' CTA
AND user's phone is unlocked
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user's MLB app is opened on users phone
AND user is brought to favorite/followed team page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user selects the favorite/followed team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN teams page on Apple Watch gets updated with user's favorite/followed team
Note: user might need to refresh the page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls down
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN screen is not scrollable

title: Teams page - user doesn't have a favorite team but has followed teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch
AND user doesn't have a favorite team selected
AND user has followed teams selected
custom_expected: User can add a favorite team in the app, then click edit to remove it

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user opens the MLB app
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with first slide
AND user's followed team is displayed

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls down
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN next followed team is displayed (if any)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has all teams selected as followed
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN all teams are displayed in the list

title: Scores page - user has a favorite team and NO followed teams
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch
AND user has a favorite team
AND user doesn't have a followed team

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user slides left on the home screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with second slide
AND the header of the slide is 'Live'
AND user is displayed with list of the games (separate TC for list logic)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user scrolls down
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees more games

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views live games
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the 'LIVE' label is displayed on the top left corner

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user's views game of their favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the star is displayed next to the team name

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views final games
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the 'FINAL' label is displayed on the top left corner

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the rest of the game list
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the games are divided in sections:

- Upcoming
- Final

title: Game mini states/scores
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a scheduled game on the home tab / mini score section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN both teams logos are displayed on the left
AND game time is displayed in the right side
![](index.php?/attachments/get/14312683)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a live game on the home tab / mini score section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Team logos are displayed in the left and right corner
AND scores are displayed next to the team logos
AND current inning is displayed in the middle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a final game on the home tab / mini score section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Team logos are displayed in the left and right corner
AND final scores are displayed next to the team logos
AND 'FINAL' displayed in the middle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a final game with extra innings on the home tab / mini score section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Team logos are displayed in the left and right corner
AND final scores are displayed next to the team logos
AND 'FINAL' with inning displayed in the middle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a game that ended early / mini score section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Team logos are displayed in the left and right corner
AND final scores are displayed next to the team logos
AND 'FINAL' with inning displayed in the middle

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a delayed game on the home tab / mini score section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN both teams logos are displayed on the left
AND 'Delayed' is displayed in the right side

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a postponed game on the home tab / mini score section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN both teams logos are displayed on the left
AND 'Postponed' is displayed in the right side

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a canceled game on the home tab / mini score section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN both teams logos are displayed on the left
AND 'Canceled' is displayed in the right side

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views a suspended game on the home tab / mini score section
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN Team logos are displayed in the left and right corner
AND final scores are displayed next to the team logos
AND 'Suspended' displayed in the middle

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views the game state
AND user's AP has a bad connection
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN team logos have white placeholder
AND -- is displayed for the scores

title: Standings page - user has fav team - league order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch
AND user has a favorite team

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Standings page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the League Standings order of divisions would start with the users favorite team’s division
AND the order of the next two divisions would be the other divisions in the same league of the users favorite team in DDO
AND the order of the next three divisions would be three divisions from the other league in DDO
AND the Wild Card Standings should start with the league of your favorite team

Example
Given a Cardinals Fan

NL Central

NL East

NL West

AL East

AL Central

AL West

NL Wild Card

AL Wild Card

title: Standings page - user doesn't have fav team - league order
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch
AND user doesn't have a favorite team

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the Standings page
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the order of divisions would be the DDO (Default Division Order) 

Default Division Order (DDO)
League ID & Division ID can be found at league.id & division.id

League Standings

1. American League 103

AL East – 201

AL Central – 202

AL West – 200

2. National League  104

NL East – 204

NL Central – 205

NL West – 203

Wild Card Standings

American League Wild Card

National League Wild Card

title: Scores are up to date

custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN scores are updated in LA, Scores page and mini score board

title: LA display on AW lock screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user's Apple Watch screen is locked
AND user's LA is on
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the LA on the AW home screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* teams logo, background color and current scores
* game status (if live display inning, base and outs)
* if game is live, the pitching team will have a small arrow next to it
AND all the information is up to date
AND all game states are displayed correctly

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the Apple Watch MLB App

title: Extra innings AND/OR game finished early
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user views the LA
AND game has extra innings
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN LA display correct inning

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN game finished early
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN LA display 'FINAL' and correct inning

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN LA is displayed on user's phone
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see LA on Apple Watch as well

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN LA disappeared on user's phone
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should not see LA on Apple Watch as well

title: LA flow
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on LA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to an option to open the game in the app (gameday)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user turns the LA off
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is not seeing LA on AP lock screen

title: Complications flow
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user is following a team
AND team has a live game
AND user clicks on complications
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the games detail view page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the hamburger menu on the top left corner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is brought to the scores page 
AND user sees other games

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user selects MLB App in complications
AND game is live
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see the game in complications

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN there is no game for the day or season is over
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees 'No Game' or 'No Game Scheduled' in complication https://www.figma.com/design/5nJ9AKwH8HqlLq7pSRoKnh/Apple-Watch-Specs?node-id=190-143823&node-type=SECTION&t=O5A3mHigeXTJt8uN-0

title: Complications displaying team logic
custom_preconds:
GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch
AND user selects MLB App in complications

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user has a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN favorite team should be displayed in complication

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user doesn't have a favorite team
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the complication should display the first game on the schedule
AND Complications should never display a user’s Followed Team(s)

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN a Favorite team is off
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the complication should display the next game

title: Notification display on AW lock screen
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN user's Apple Watch screen is locked
AND user receives a push notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user sees the PN on the AW home screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user views the LA
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is displayed with: 

* MLB logo at the top left corner
* time of notification on the top right corner
* PN copy

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the LA
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the Apple Watch MLB App

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user swipes the PN
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN PN disappears

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN MLB App notification is displayed on user's phone
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should see the notification on Apple Watch as well

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN MLB App notification disappeared on user's phone
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user should not see the notification on Apple Watch as well

title: Notification flow
custom_preconds: GIVEN user has an MLB app on Apple Watch

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on notification
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN user is taken to the games score expanded view page

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN user clicks on the hamburger menu on the top left corner
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN user is brought to the scores page 
AND user sees other games
